title: Add steps to existing project agents
description: File: D:\delivery-app-lab\opencode.json. Add 'steps' field to agents plan, review, db. Proposed values: plan -> steps: 50, review -> steps: 30, db -> steps: 40. These agents already have temperature defined. Steps limits agentic iterations to control costs. Acceptance: opencode.json has steps defined for all 3 agents.

title: Add slim agents to project opencode.json
description: File: D:\delivery-app-lab\opencode.json. Add oracle, fixer, explorer, librarian, designer agents with project-level temperature and steps overrides. title: Add skills to librarian and oracle in slim config

Changes: 1) librarian.skills: add find-skills, skill-creator (currently empty []) 2) oracle.skills: add skill-creator (currently: nestjs-best-practices, architecture-patterns, database-design, prisma-expert) 3) explorer.skills: add find-skills (currently: beads-workflow only). Both find-skills and skill-creator verified to exist at D:\delivery-app-lab\.opencode\skills\. Acceptance: all 3 agents have updated skills arrays.
close_reason: Added find-skills/skill-creator to librarian, skill-creator to oracle, find-skills to explorer in logship-mvp preset

title: Assign tavily MCP to librarian in slim config

Note: websearch and grep_app are built-in slim MCPs (not project-scope). tavily is project-scope (defined in D:\delivery-app-lab\opencode.json). Acceptance: librarian has tavily in mcps array.
